sourcesContent:
import React, { FC, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../../styles/ShoppingCart/ShoppingCart.css' interface ShoppingCartProps { windowWidth: number, setShoppingCart: Function, shoppingCart: any } const ShoppingCart: FC = ({ windowWidth, setShoppingCart, shoppingCart }) => { const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(false) const [modalIndex, setModalIndex] = useState(null); const [totalItems, setTotalItems] = useState(0) const [totalCost, setTotalCost] = useState(0) const handleRemoveModalOpen = (indexId: number) => { setModalIndex(indexId) setModalOpen(true) document.body.style.overflowY = 'hidden'; } const handleRemoveModalClose = () => { setModalIndex(null) setModalOpen(false) document.body.style.overflowY = 'auto'; } useEffect(() => { const itemQuantitys = shoppingCart.map((product: any) => product.productQuantity); setTotalItems(itemQuantitys.reduce((accumulator: any, currentValue: any) => { return accumulator + currentValue; }, 0)) const subTotals = shoppingCart.map((product: any) => product.productQuantity * product.price); setTotalCost(subTotals.reduce((accumulator: any, currentValue: any) => { return accumulator + currentValue; }, 0)) }, [shoppingCart]) const removeItemFromCart = (productId: number, productColor: string, productSize: string) => { const updatedShoppingCart = shoppingCart.filter((product: any) => product.id !== productId && product.color !== productColor && product.size !== productSize) console.log(updatedShoppingCart) } return (

Shopping Cart

{shoppingCart.map((product: any, index: number) => (
e.preventDefault()} />

{product.title}

Color: {product.color.toUpperCase()} Size: {product.size} Quantity: {product.productQuantity}
${product.price} SubTotal: ${product.price * product.productQuantity}
{(modalOpen && modalIndex === index) && (
Remove Item

Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?

)}
))}

Order Summary

{totalItems ? totalItems : 0} Item(s)
Item(s) Subtotal ${totalCost ? totalCost : 0}
Shipping TBD
Subtotal ${totalCost ? totalCost : 0}
Estimated Tax TBD

Order Total

${totalCost ? totalCost : 0}
) } export default ShoppingCart
